catalog_script_client.name: Populate fields from ref record

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_6c2f89242f410110ee00d5f62799b672
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Edit Resource">5d4d89a02f410110ee00d5f62799b62a</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:f7dd85a02f410110ee00d5f62799b665</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Populate fields from ref record</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
var reference = g_form.getReference('select_record',getDetails);
	function getDetails(reference){
		g_form.setValue('name',reference.name);
		g_form.setValue('notes',reference.notes);
		g_form.setValue('active',reference.active);
	}
	
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-11 08:12:43</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6c2f89242f410110ee00d5f62799b672</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate fields from ref record</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="German Learning" source="x_723119_germanlrn">612b9ab72f100110ee00d5f62799b622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="German Learning">612b9ab72f100110ee00d5f62799b622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6c2f89242f410110ee00d5f62799b672</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>icristi</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-30 21:13:17</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
